SEARCH
Package com.app.repository.impl

Class ProductRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
com.app.repository.impl.ProductRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProductRepository, Repository<Long,Product>
@Component public class ProductRepositoryImpl extends Object implements ProductRepository
Implementation of the ProductRepository interface that provides access to product data.

This class loads product data from a file using the Load interface and parses it using a LineParser.

    • ProductRepositoryImpl

      public ProductRepositoryImpl(@Value("${productFilename:products.txt}") String productFilename, Load<Long,Product> load, LineParser<Long,Product> lineParser)
      Constructs a ProductRepositoryImpl with the specified file name, loader, and parser.
      Parameters:
      productFilename - the name of the file containing product data
      load - the Load implementation used to read the product data from the file
      lineParser - the LineParser implementation used to parse the product data
